result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Deboer, Desmond K

records.addlTxt:
NOT CALLED ON THE RECORD: 
9:44 AM Defendant Desmond K Deboer in court. in custody.  Attorney Nicholas Martinez in court for Desmond K Deboer.  Prosecuting attorney Alyssa M. Schaller in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Martinez is requesting a new date for status.
Hearing scheduled for December 9, 2022 at 10:30 am.

COURT SETS $50.00 CASH BOND IN LIEU OF SIGNATURE BOND.
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing. Defendant to have no contact with victims A & B listed in the Criminal Complaint/Victim Identification Key.  Defendant is not to share, reproduce or distribute any personal and/or identifying information about the crime victim(s), except to their attorney. Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol. Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed. Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia. Defendant allowed one trip to the residence accompanied by a peace/police officer to obtain personal items.

Defendant Desmond K Deboer in court, in custody.  Attorney Nicholas Martinez in court for Desmond K Deboer.  Prosecuting attorney Christian Farina in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case called regarding revocation of signature bond.  Court approves and sets cash bail of $50.00 in lieu of signature bond.  Next date remains on calendar as scheduled.  Court advised parties if case will resolve, contact his staff to set plea/sentencing date.
Bail/bond hearing on September 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Notice of Motion and Motion to Revoke Signature on Signature Bond;  
**Reviewed by Judge Melvin on 09-22-2022:  set asap, today if possible... or tomorrow AM...

ADDRESS INFO for Desmond K Deboer
Current: 515 W. Moreland Blvd., c/o Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States  (Effective: 09-22-2022)
Prior: W335 N6835 Stone Bank Rd, Oconomowoc, WI 53066
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.

records.addlTxt: Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing. Defendant to have no contact with victims A & B listed in the Criminal Complaint/Victim Identification Key.  Defendant is not to share, reproduce or distribute any personal and/or identifying information about the crime victim(s), except to their attorney. Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol. Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed. Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia. Defendant allowed one trip to the residence accompanied by a peace/police officer to obtain personal items.

1:41 PM District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin by Abigail Kincheloe. Defendant Desmond K Deboer in court, in custody.  Attorney Justin G Griffis in court for Desmond K Deboer. 

Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint. 
Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties. 
Court advises of right to an attorney. Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed. 
The Court finds that the Domestic Repeater in Count 2 does not fit under the statue.
The Court strikes the repeater enhancer on Count 2 on its own motion.
NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.
Hearing scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.
